entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is working on his homework. He is described as grabbing the tape measure and unrolling his own homework.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as Harry's friend who is also working on his homework. He is described as letting go of his parchment and scribbling away.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who has completed her homework and is looking for another book to read. She is described as emerging from between the bookshelves and looking irritable.

entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is mentioned as assigning a three-foot long composition on ‘The Medieval Assembly of European Wizards’.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is mentioned as someone who is being talked about by Ron. He is described as being considered great by Justin Finch-Fletchley.

entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: Justin is mentioned as running away from Harry and talking about Lockhart being great.

relationships.description: Harry compares the size of his homework to Hermione's, saying she has done four feet seven inches and her writing is tiny.
Ron shows concern for Harry when he tells him about Justin running away from him.
Hermione is described as looking for another book to read.
